prompt:
Patient: this whole fluid restriction

Patient: stuff.

Nurse: I'm sorry, Mr. Delarosa, I didn't quite catch that. Could you please repeat what you said?

Patient: I said I hate following this diet and

Nurse: Hold on a second while I figure out how I can best support you.

Patient: trying to monitor my fluid restriction.

Nurse: When did the change in speech start, Mr. Delarosa?

Patient: No change in speech. What are you talking about? I don't have any change in speech.

responses.gpt4: I apologize if my previous question was confusing. I didn't mean to imply that there was a change. Let's continue with our conversation, would that be okay?
responses.our_model: I apologize for any confusion, Mr. Delarosa. I was asking if you've noticed any sudden arm or leg weakness recently?
